```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)


library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(Kendall)
```


```{r}
# Read in the data 
thermal <- read_csv(here("data", "thermal_precip_temp.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() # make all column names lower cased, replace spaces and special characters with underscores

```


```{r dailyplots, echo=TRUE}

ggplot(thermal, aes(x = date, y = tmax)) +
         geom_line() +
         labs(y="Daily Maximum Temperature (degrees F)", x="Date")

ggplot(thermal, aes(x = date, y = tmin))+
  geom_line()+ 
  labs(y="Daily Minimum Temperature (degrees F)", x="Date")

ggplot(thermal, aes(x = date, y = prcp))+
  geom_line()+ 
  labs(y="Daily Rainfall (in)", x="Date")

```
